Bernie Sanders , a Vermont independent who's seeking re-election next year, distributed a fundraising appeal to constituents that detailed threats against Arizona Democratic lawmakers in addition to Gabrielle Giffords . It asked whether right-wing reactionaries, through threats and acts of violence, intimidated people with different points of view from expressing their political positions in the state. , Colin Powell became obsessed with justifying himself to the point of falsifying what happened. Donald Rumsfeld clearly can't abide Colin Powell 's deputy, Dick Cheney Armitage. In one scene, he confronts Colin Powell , telling him that Armitage has been bad-mouthing the Pentagon all over town... I don't know what the hell is in Armitage's craw but I'm tired of it. , a game in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter. " Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point," Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
